message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down a bit to $180. I believe this product is worth every penny, and I'm sure you'll find it valuable too.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $140.
